Today in County Clare, surf is looking solid at 8 ft @ 14s WNW with a fresh 17 mph SE wind. Crab Island and Doolin Point are your best bets, especially during the tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with fresh 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. On the day after, surf improves to 7 ft @ 12s W with light 7 mph SSE winds, offering fun options at Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: today.
